name: Home Goods Wizard
description:
Developed as a part of Team Dogpit's Cultivation Jam. Download recommended for the best experience!

Premise

You are the Home Goods Wizard! Use your workbenches to perform magic rituals in order to evolve an ordinary log into a wide variety of household items! There's 26 items to cultivate - can you discover them all?

Tips & Hints
  • Use [Q] and [R] to cycle through your available tools: Knock, Pull, Polish, and Shake.
  • If you mess up a ritual, use the Erase tool to reset the current furniture item (as opposed to starting over from scratch with the 'Reset to Log' button).
  • Use [B] to view the Furniture Catalog, which gives you information about the items you've discovered and hints for each ritual you can perform.
  • Some furniture items have multiple components, which can change the effect of certain tools (e.g. Polish Tabletop is different than Polish Door...)
  • Fully cultivated items aren't the only ones that can be added to the cabin - some intermediate items can be as well. Items marked with a red X in the catalog are ones that are able to be submitted but haven't yet, while items marked with a green check mark are those that have been submitted and moved into the cabin
Developer Notes
  • Don't be alarmed at no audio - there's no sounds or music yet!
  • There's currently not a way to save progress (for now...)
